SELECT BOARD_NO boardNo , CATEGORY_NAME category , USER_NAME boardWriter , BOARD_TITLE boardTitle , CREATE_DATE createDate , COUNT FROM KH_BOARD JOIN KH_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN KH_MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE KH_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{boardLimit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT CATEGORY_NO categoryNo , CATEGORY_NAME categoryName FROM KH_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KH_ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL , #{originName} , #{changeName} , #{filePath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE KH_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO boardNo , USER_NAME boardWriter , CATEGORY_NAME category , BOARD_TITLE boardTitle , BOARD_CONTENT boardContent FROM KH_BOARD JOIN KH_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN KH_MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE KH_BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT FILE_NO fileNo , ORIGIN_NAME originName , CHANGE_NAME changeName , FILE_PATH filePath FROM KH_ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{boardNo}
